data.name: Zero spring episode 1 English translation version
data.detailed_description:
It is an FPS game with horror and suspense elements.
This game provides a search that you can enjoy easily.
The unique part of this game is where there is a recovering character to support you. You have to fight while protecting her.Health recovery will be difficult if you lose her.There is a neat story.There are no Jump-scares.Zombies that make you sick will not appear in this game.

This game is developed using GameGuru, but it is superior to other games made with GameGuru in the following points.

1 Adjusted the strength of enemy characters and game balance.
2 Original characters.
3 Game nature that can not be created with default GameGuru such as sniper and recovery character.
4 Elements to excite stories such as books and notes.
5 You won't use shitty default GameGuru weapons.

It is suitable for such players.
1 I would like to look for keys and solve mysteries than shootings with enemies.
2 I want to enjoy basic suspense stories easily at cheap price.

It is not suitable for such players.
1 I want to play a game that shoot enemies violently.
2 I want to enjoy full-scale horror over time.
3 I am concerned about the low quality of graphics.

Story
2054,Japan. Policemen conducted investigations on illegal building of hospital constructed by emerging religion but did not return.Because it was a hospital for a settlement on the mountain,the investigation seems difficult.The prefectural police decided to dispatch special forces.But the wife of the captain of the special forces was a nurse at this hospital.The prefectural police asked to remove the captain,as the player, from the assignment and take a vacation.But the player began climbing the mountain alone to investigate the hospital.Hasegawa of information officer and Nagase of medical officer carefully supported the player.

To beat this game..
1 Recovery character "Nagase" can switch between "following" and "on the spot" by pressing the "G" key. MAX HP is 300. If you start the game, We recommend that you first approach Nagase.
2 Computers and books on the desk can approach and read with the "E" key.
3 The light is not initial equipment. Investigation becomes difficult unless you obtain the light.
4 There are enemy snipers in this game. Even if you get damage where there is nothing, it is not a game bug.
5 You can also target normal weapons with right click. If you do not aim the sight will be blurred in reaction.
6 The key is also hidden in places where it will be a blind spot.
7 In the final stage, the occupation of the player may be a hint to solve a mystery.(It's as difficult as a person accustomed to FPS games)

This is an English translation version.
Voices in the Japanese version has been cut.Several documents are not translated completely and the summary is displayed in the subtitle.
Also, documents that are not important are not translated.
Episode is scheduled to be completed in 3 episodes.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/974010/Zero_spring_episode_2/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1000900/Zero_spring_episode_3/

data.short_description: 2054,Japan. Policemen conducted investigations on illegal building of hospital constructed by emerging religion but did not return. The wife of Player was a nurse at this hospital. Player began climbing the mountain to investigate the hospital.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or later - (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2700 MB available space
